name: seaside stash busting blanket
notes:
this is the **seaside stash busting blanket** - which i hosted as a 35 week ‘crochet along’ on my blog 
www.coastalcrochet.com from january - september 2018. all the details remain on my blog. it became a 
worldwide community project with people from over 50 different countries crocheting this blanket!
the original blanket was made using only yarns i had in my stash. the variety of stitch combinations and 
colours were inspired each week by the textures and colours of the seaside.

**the full pattern is now available as a 10 page printer friendly pdf in my ravelry store.**

the pattern remains free over on my blog in 35 weekly instalments.
https://coastalcrochet.com/

all the details for week 1 are here: https://coastalcrochet.com/2018/01/19/this-is-exciting-im-hosting-a-crochet-along-part-1/

it's a fun project which is designed to use up existing stash, so be creative with colours!
